description: Two storey side extension; single storey side/rear extension; alterations from hip to gable end; rear roof extension to main roofslope and to rear outrigger; and installation of one rooflights to front roofslope first floor flank; hip roof to half gable with full width rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed two storey side extension, single storey side/rear extensions, roof extensions and associated alterations due to their design and scale would represent an undesirable overdevelopment of the site which would fail to preserve the character and appearance of the existing dwellinghouse and the surrounding area. As such, the proposal is contrary to policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); Polices 1.1 and 1.2 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and Policies LV.7.4 and 7B of Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
